import React from 'react' import {UilCelsius, UilTimes, UilLocationArrow } from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import { iconUrlFromCode } from '../services/WeatherServices' import {motion} from 'framer-motion' function DropDownContent(props) { return (

 ) } export default DropDownContent
